description: From Middle English housbondly, equivalent to husband +â€Ž -ly.

adjectives.description: husbandly (comparative more husbandly, superlative most husbandly)

entries.meaning: Characteristic of a husband; proper and fitting for a husband; marital.
examples: As a result, analogies between royal, paternal, and husbandly authority were frequently drawn.

entries.meaning: (obsolete) Pertaining to a husbandman or husbandry.
